text: Do you guys need anything more from me on Goldmember today? I have time to do more stuff but don't know what your needs are right now. I can make more widget animations if you think it's worth spending the time on it. <@U02F9CXTL> <@U02688JHZ>
<@U026E0ZNR> it could be nice to have a larger widget to test with, just to make sure the bigger sprite sheet won't exceed any limits
Ok, Do you want me to do that with the widget or go whole hog and export that full screen glitch effect as a sprite? Or both?
while the glitch could be a test, I don't see a full screen sprite sheet in the implementation. let's just go with the widget
that glitch does look really great though and I appreciate having it as reference
No prob! I'll find I nice big widget and we'll see how far we can push it till it breaks.
awesome, thank you!
Hey <@U02AUNA0P> or <@U02F9CXTL>, could you send me the font files for this project? I specifically need the Retro Computer font, but the other one would be nice too.
sent!
<!channel>: Train departure time fast approaching, and some of you are eating lunch or in other meetings. Quick virtual stand-up?
on my end: coordinating final pushes for today's code push (EOD today), answering questions about animation test progress, hoping I have cell service for 5pm call

I'm working on deploying the backend and cms application to the gwweb-uncorked project. Got it running and accessing the project's datastore just fine locally so I just need to deploy and we'll have a second copy of everything that we can use as a dev server if need be
working on animation test and adding things to trello for today's delivery as I think of it.
also s/o to adam for hooking me up with the service account key so quickly
also trying not to touch the nexus 5 because the nfc button is triggered really easily
I've been fixing up some error handling and image display in BG cms.
<@U02AUNA0P>: nine-patches: <http://petrnohejl.github.io/Android-Cheatsheet-For-Graphic-Designers/#nine-patch>

attachments.title: Android Cheatsheet for Graphic Designers
attachments.text: This simple cheatsheet should help graphic designers to do their job better, and to simplify developers' lives.

text:
Hey guys, would you mind giving me some feedback on how this widget turned out? I'll make a sprite sheet as soon as I get the :ok_hand:

<https://www.dropbox.com/s/4lgujrtfxv6sw8a/FullScreen_Widget02.mp4?dl=0>
that is prettyyyy awesome
glitches look really cool
those are sweet
that's rad
current dev and future production server and cms are up and running: <http://gweb-uncorked.appspot.com/>
I gave it the same users that tidy-federation has and it's using the same secret to decode API tokens so those work for both
